title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Obersaxen, Switzerland
content:
Photo submitted by Tim Bridge, “On the mountain bike trail from the Alp Sezner towards Surcuolm. In the backround, the Swiss Alps of Surselva, Graubuenden, Switzerland.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day.
